channel.title: Duping
channel.description:
Hello, this might be posted in the wrong forum section and it might also NOT be so relevant. Anyways, I'm here to ask you guys if anyone here knows how to find out new "duping" ways in 317?
Like I said, I'm very sorry if I'm posting this is wrong forum section.

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“zlinker, post:5, topic:435144”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=537863.msg3934338#msg3934338 date=1330930764]
older servers didn’t check if the item you wanted to equip was in your inventory, fake a equip packet for the item you desire.
[/quote]
Alright, May I ask how you fake an equip packet?:)[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @zlinker zlinker
item.description:
@zlinker wrote:

easy, get on a server and go trying
If I would have thought it was easy, so that's why I'm asking. But do you have any advice on how to dupe or any secret dupe ways that you would like to share with me then? And you wrote that I should go on a server and try to find new ways to dupe, but what should I do? I mean, "try" to do what?:)
